device_timeout: Timout error, please check if the device has the correct IP Address and if it is online.
device_404: 404 error, please check with the developer of the App.

pair.title: Add Willow
pair.subtitle: Enter the IP address for your Willow
pair.startpairingwillow: To get started with adding your Willow robot, you'll need to find its IP address. Here's a simple guide on how to do that: Open the EEVE app and connect to your robot. Then, go to the Settings widget and select Remote Control. This will open a web browser where you can view the URL containing the robot's IP address, typically in the format http://192.168.x.x:8080. Copy the IP address (excluding the port :8080) and enter it in the next view in the app to proceed with the remote control setup.
pair.nosettings: Please enter the IP for your Willow
pair.testing: Connection test succesfull, you can now connect the Willow device.
